title: Dependency Injection Pattern for DOM Testing
content:
Added dependency injection support to QuickTabsManager to enable testing the full UI layer without requiring real DOM elements.

**Pattern Implemented:**
- CreateHandler accepts optional windowFactory parameter in constructor
- QuickTabsManager stores windowFactory in options
- initQuickTabs() passes windowFactory through to manager
- Tests can inject mock factory: initQuickTabs(eventBus, Events, { windowFactory: mockFn })

**Files Modified:**
- src/features/quick-tabs/handlers/CreateHandler.js
- src/features/quick-tabs/index.js

**Benefits:**
- Clean architecture (dependency injection)
- Backward compatible (factory is optional)
- Enables DOM-layer testing without JSDOM
- More maintainable than Jest module mocking

**Test File:**
- tests/integration/scenarios/scenario-01-basic-cross-tab-sync-DOM.test.js
- Uses mockWindowFactory injected via initQuickTabs options
- Tests full QuickTabsManager facade with mocked window creation

**Status:** Framework complete, debugging initialization flow (commit be76c35)
